trans-unit.source: Update your StorSimple device
trans-unit.target: Update your StorSimple device

trans-unit.source: Overview
trans-unit.target: Overview

trans-unit.source: The StorSimple updates features allow you to easily keep your StorSimple device up-to-date.
trans-unit.target: The StorSimple updates features allow you to easily keep your StorSimple device up-to-date.

trans-unit.source: Depending on the update type, you can apply updates to the device via the Microsoft Azure Management Portal or via the Windows PowerShell interface.
trans-unit.target: Depending on the update type, you can apply updates to the device via the Microsoft Azure Management Portal or via the Windows PowerShell interface.

trans-unit.source: This tutorial describes the update types and how to install each of them.
trans-unit.target: This tutorial describes the update types and how to install each of them.

trans-unit.source: You can apply two types of device updates:
trans-unit.target: You can apply two types of device updates:

trans-unit.source: Regular (or Normal mode) updates
trans-unit.target: Regular (or Normal mode) updates

trans-unit.source: Maintenance mode updates
trans-unit.target: Maintenance mode updates

trans-unit.source: You can install regular updates via the Management Portal or Windows PowerShell; however, you must use Windows PowerShell to install Maintenance mode updates.
trans-unit.target: You can install regular updates via the Management Portal or Windows PowerShell; however, you must use Windows PowerShell to install Maintenance mode updates.

trans-unit.source: Each update type is described separately, below.
trans-unit.target: Each update type is described separately, below.

trans-unit.source: Regular updates
trans-unit.target: Regular updates

trans-unit.source: Regular updates are non-disruptive updates that can be installed when the device is in Normal mode.
trans-unit.target: Regular updates are non-disruptive updates that can be installed when the device is in Normal mode.

trans-unit.source: These updates are applied through the Microsoft Update website to each device controller.
trans-unit.target: These updates are applied through the Microsoft Update website to each device controller.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] A controller failover may occur during the update process.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] A controller failover may occur during the update process.

trans-unit.source: However, this will not affect system availability or operation.
trans-unit.target: However, this will not affect system availability or operation.

trans-unit.source: For details on how to install regular updates via the Management Portal, see [Install regular updates via the Management Portal](#install-regular-updates-via-the-management-portal).
trans-unit.target: For details on how to install regular updates via the Management Portal, see [Install regular updates via the Management Portal](#install-regular-updates-via-the-management-portal).

trans-unit.source: You can also install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: You can also install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple](#install-regular-updates-via-windows-powershell-for-storsimple).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple](#install-regular-updates-via-windows-powershell-for-storsimple).

trans-unit.source: Maintenance mode updates
trans-unit.target: Maintenance mode updates

trans-unit.source: Maintenance Mode updates are disruptive updates such as disk firmware upgrades or USM firmware upgrades.
trans-unit.target: Maintenance Mode updates are disruptive updates such as disk firmware upgrades or USM firmware upgrades.

trans-unit.source: These updates require the device to be put into Maintenance mode.
trans-unit.target: These updates require the device to be put into Maintenance mode.

trans-unit.source: For details, see [Step 2: Enter Maintenance mode](#step2).
trans-unit.target: For details, see [Step 2: Enter Maintenance mode](#step2).

trans-unit.source: You cannot use the Management Portal to install Maintenance mode updates.
trans-unit.target: You cannot use the Management Portal to install Maintenance mode updates.

trans-unit.source: Instead, you must use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: Instead, you must use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: For details on how to install Maintenance mode updates, see [Install Maintenance mode updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple](#install-maintenance-mode-updates-via-windows-powershell-for-storsimple).
trans-unit.target: For details on how to install Maintenance mode updates, see [Install Maintenance mode updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple](#install-maintenance-mode-updates-via-windows-powershell-for-storsimple).

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Maintenance mode updates must be applied separately to each controller.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Maintenance mode updates must be applied separately to each controller.

trans-unit.source: Install regular updates via the Management Portal
trans-unit.target: Install regular updates via the Management Portal

trans-unit.source: You can use the Management Portal to apply updates to your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: You can use the Management Portal to apply updates to your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: Install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: Install regular updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: Alternatively, you can use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to apply regular (Normal mode) updates.
trans-unit.target: Alternatively, you can use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to apply regular (Normal mode) updates.

trans-unit.source: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Although you can install regular updates using Windows PowerShell for StorSimple, we strongly recommend that you install regular updates through the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: [AZURE.IMPORTANT] Although you can install regular updates using Windows PowerShell for StorSimple, we strongly recommend that you install regular updates through the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: Beginning with Update 1, pre-checks will be performed prior to installing updates from the Portal.
trans-unit.target: Beginning with Update 1, pre-checks will be performed prior to installing updates from the Portal.

trans-unit.source: These pre-checks will preempt failures and ensure a smoother experience.
trans-unit.target: These pre-checks will preempt failures and ensure a smoother experience.

trans-unit.source: Install Maintenance mode updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple
trans-unit.target: Install Maintenance mode updates via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.source: You use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to apply Maintenance mode updates to your StorSimple device.
trans-unit.target: You use Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to apply Maintenance mode updates to your StorSimple device.

trans-unit.source: All I/O requests are paused in this mode.
trans-unit.target: All I/O requests are paused in this mode.

trans-unit.source: Services such as non-volatile random access memory (NVRAM) or the clustering service are also stopped.
trans-unit.target: Services such as non-volatile random access memory (NVRAM) or the clustering service are also stopped.

trans-unit.source: Both controllers are rebooted when you enter or exit this mode.
trans-unit.target: Both controllers are rebooted when you enter or exit this mode.

trans-unit.source: When you exit this mode, all the services will resume and should be healthy.
trans-unit.target: When you exit this mode, all the services will resume and should be healthy.

trans-unit.source: (This may take a few minutes.)
trans-unit.target: (This may take a few minutes.)

trans-unit.source: If you need to apply Maintenance mode updates, you will receive an alert through the Management Portal that you have updates that must be installed.
trans-unit.target: If you need to apply Maintenance mode updates, you will receive an alert through the Management Portal that you have updates that must be installed.

trans-unit.source: This alert will include instructions for using Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install the updates.
trans-unit.target: This alert will include instructions for using Windows PowerShell for StorSimple to install the updates.

trans-unit.source: After you update your device, use the same procedure to change the device to Regular mode.
trans-unit.target: After you update your device, use the same procedure to change the device to Regular mode.

trans-unit.source: For step-by-step instructions, see [Step 4: Exit Maintenance mode](#step4).
trans-unit.target: For step-by-step instructions, see [Step 4: Exit Maintenance mode](#step4).

trans-unit.source: Before entering Maintenance mode, verify that both device controllers are healthy by checking the **Hardware Status** on the **Maintenance** page in the Management Portal.
trans-unit.target: Before entering Maintenance mode, verify that both device controllers are healthy by checking the **Hardware Status** on the **Maintenance** page in the Management Portal.

trans-unit.source: If the controller is not healthy, contact Microsoft Support for the next steps.
trans-unit.target: If the controller is not healthy, contact Microsoft Support for the next steps.

trans-unit.source: For more information, go to Contact Microsoft Support.
trans-unit.target: For more information, go to Contact Microsoft Support.

trans-unit.source: When you are in Maintenance mode, you need to apply the update first on one controller and then on the other controller.
trans-unit.target: When you are in Maintenance mode, you need to apply the update first on one controller and then on the other controller.

trans-unit.target: Install hotfixes via Windows PowerShell for StorSimple

trans-unit.target: Unlike updates for Microsoft Azure StorSimple, hotfixes are installed from a shared folder.

trans-unit.target: Maintenance mode hotfixes

trans-unit.source: What happens to updates if you perform a factory reset of the device?
trans-unit.target: What happens to updates if you perform a factory reset of the device?

trans-unit.source: If a device is reset to factory settings, then all the updates are lost.
trans-unit.target: If a device is reset to factory settings, then all the updates are lost.

trans-unit.source: After the factory-reset device is registered and configured, you will need to manually install updates through the Management Portal and/or Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.
trans-unit.target: After the factory-reset device is registered and configured, you will need to manually install updates through the Management Portal and/or Windows PowerShell for StorSimple.

trans-unit.source: For more information about factory reset, see [Reset the device to factory default settings](storsimple-manage-device-controller.md#reset-the-device-to-factory-default-settings).
trans-unit.target: For more information about factory reset, see [Reset the device to factory default settings](storsimple-manage-device-controller.md#reset-the-device-to-factory-default-settings).
